8. Lung lesion - There is no visible lung lesion in the image.

9. Pneumonia - There is no visible pneumonia in the image.

Based on the image, the most likely findings are the enlarged mediastinum, lung opacity, and atelectasis. The pleural effusion is also visible, but it is not clear whether it is due to a medical condition or a post-procedure finding. The other options are not visible in the image.
